Hi! I'm Sara, a self-employed front-end web developer. I work with businesses and agencies around the world, building web sites and applications, focusing on HTML5, CSS3, and Javascript.

I have a Bachelors degree in Computer Sciences, love the open web platform and am an active community member. I'm also an author and team member at Codrops, where I publish tutorials and articles on the latest web technologies.

Work With Me

I also maintain this site, where I write tutorials and articles on front-end development, including the latest cutting-edge technologies.
